timeline.bodyText:
Shall we change the description to make it less verbose? The current descriptions are not adding much value. I feel that we can simplify this a lot, such as,
                `--environment` or `-e` : The environment the command is executed on
                `--name` or `-n` : The name of the respective API
                `--version` or `-v` : The version of the respective API
                `--action` or `-a` : The action to be taken to change the status of the API

        -   Optional :  
                `--provider` or `-r` : The provider of the respective API
